steps.retrieved_evidence:
I think there may be some confusion here!

The question appears to be referencing a song title by an Australian psychedelic rock band, King Gizzard & the Lizard Wizard, called "Mars for the Rich" (from their 2014 album "I'm in Your Mind Fuzz").

However, I don't see any connection between this song and NASA or alien life. So, I'll just say that I don't know!
